item.title: Welcome to the All New TechGlider Blog
item.description: This is my first post on WordPress and through this I welcome you to the all new TechGlider Blog. I am finally finished with moving the TGB to WordPress. WordPress offers a plethora of plugins to customize one’s blog and I am trying to choose what are those that I need for the TGB. As pointed out in my last post, this change hasn’t been easy. I almost lost all of my previous posts for there was no efficient way to import the posts from my b2evolution installation to WordPress, so I had to do it manually and took a whole day for that (these type of repetitive works are really a pain in the neck for me).
